main event: A civilian reported a black bell-shaped object having erratic flight patterns, hovering above his car while traveling at high speeds.
interesting points: The object hovered close to the observer's car,The observer pursued the object at speeds over 90 mph,The observer's car battery was completely discharged after the object hovered nearby,Multiple similar sightings occurred during the same period in the area,The observer requested anonymity and a lack of publicity regarding the event.
